statements.insert:
select SEQ_PM_Standard_Tare_Info_Id.nextval as IntId from dual
insert into PM_Standard_Tare_Info ( I_IntId, C_WagNo, N_TareWgt, C_ImgURL, C_PondNo, C_TareTime, I_IsWeighing, I_IsUse, C_CreateUser, D_CreateTime, C_UpdateUser, D_UpdateTime )values (#IntId#,#WagNo#,#TareWgt#,#ImgURL#,#PondNo#,#TareTime#,#IsWeighing#,#IsUse#,#CreateUser#,to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'),#UpdateUser#,to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'))
statements.update: update PM_Standard_Tare_Info set C_WagNo=#WagNo# ,N_TareWgt=#TareWgt# ,C_UpdateUser=#UpdateUser# ,I_IsUse=#IsUse# ,D_UpdateTime=to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss') where I_IntId = #IntId#
statements.select: select a.I_IntId ,a.C_WagNo ,a.N_TareWgt ,a.C_ImgURL ,a.C_PondNo ,a.C_TareTime ,a.I_IsWeighing ,a.I_IsUse ,a.C_CreateUser ,a.D_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateUser ,a.D_UpdateTime from PM_Standard_Tare_Info a where a.C_WagNo = #value# order by a.I_IntId desc
